name: Kaleidoscope (itch) (Maz)
description:
If you're feeling stressed, look into the circle and click around for a while.

"original music" (which is the new music ) is by: 

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Dlay/Far_Away_Place/feels_like_fuzz_in_my_head...

source code the one for LD, doesn't have updates

In the game aspect you click the kaleidoscope, and once the buttons turn red, you click them to make them purple.
